amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part D of House Report 117-587 to include postpartum health conditions in the list of counseling to women who gave birth while in custody or prior to custody.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frankel, Lois amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) and the bill pursuant to the rule.
Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Frankel, Lois.

Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Frankel, Lois amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Frankel, Lois amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
